name: Deep Dark Dungeon of Anglaus
description:
This is a first-person horror game with puzzle and slasher elements. You have to explore a dark dungeon, light torches, solve problems that appear on your way.

Game Features:

- Horror from the first person;
- Solving puzzles;
- Horror, where the main character can stand up for himself;
- The story unfolds through the notes and dialogues of the NPC;
- Two endings;
- Hidden secrets.
